about.title: About
about.heading: Where People Meet Music
about.paragraph1: PLAN-G Entertainment is a forward-thinking music label dedicated to discovering and nurturing exceptional talent. We believe in the power of authentic artistry and innovative sound.
about.paragraph2: Our mission is to create meaningful connections between artists and audiences worldwide, pushing boundaries while staying true to our artistic integrity.
about.paragraph3: We provide comprehensive support for our artists, from music production to global distribution, ensuring their creative vision reaches every corner of the world.

item1.heading: Welcome to PLAN-G Entertainment
item1.content: PLAN-G Entertainment launches its official website. A new chapter begins where music meets vision. Discover our artists and their latest releases.

contact.title: Contact
contact.openToIdeas: We're Always Open to New Ideas
contact.description1: Whether you're an artist looking for representation, a brand seeking partnership opportunities, or a media outlet interested in our story, we'd love to hear from you.
